movies.title: Saan gai bin fung wong
movies.plot: While in visiting Hong Kong to perform in a concert, a violinist from Mainland China got himself mixed up in a jewel heist and became a prime target of the robbers. As a result, he comes under protection by a tough and perfectionistic, yet hilarious female cop.
movies.simplePlot: While in visiting Hong Kong to perform in a concert, a violinist from Mainland China got himself mixed up in a jewel heist and became a prime target of the robbers. As a result, he comes ...

biography.bio: Teresa Mo was born on November 5, 1959 in Hong Kong as Mo Sun-Kwan. She is an actress and writer, known for Hard Boiled (1992), Men Suddenly in Black (2003) and Legend of the Dragon (1991). She has been married to Tony Au since 1994. They have two children. She was previously married to Chiang Ka-chun and Man Shu-yeung.
biography.name: Teresa Mo

biography.bio: Ching Wan Lau was born on February 16, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Mad detective (2007), La vie sans principe (2011) and Black Mask (1996). He has been married to Amy Kwok since 1998.
biography.name: Ching Wan Lau

biography.bio: Gabriel Wong was born on July 8, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Wong Chi-Keung. He is an actor, known for Fight Back to School II (1992), Lin shi yan yuan (1993) and Saan gai bin fung wong (1994).
biography.name: Gabriel Wong

biography.bio: Vivian Lai was born on February 18, 1973 in Hong Kong. She is known for her work on Yi ben man hua chuang tian ya II miao xiang tian kai (1993), Ye ban er dian zhong (1997) and Saan gai bin fung wong (1994).
biography.name: Vivian Lai

biography.bio: Fung Woo was born on January 18, 1932 in Guangzhou, Guangdong, Republic of China as Wu Kai-sau. He is an actor and director, known for Police Story (1985), Les associés (1991) and Overheard 2 (2011). He was previously married to Wing-Ho Lui.
biography.name: Fung Woo

biography.bio: Billy Lau is an actor and writer, known for Mr. Vampire (1985), Police Story 2 (1988) and Eastern Condors (1987).
biography.name: Billy Lau

biography.bio: Wing-Chung Leung is an actor and director, known for The Defender (1994), Gau ban ji ma goon ji baak min bau ching tin (1994) and Hong Kong 97 (1994).
biography.name: Wing-Chung Leung

biography.bio: Fui-On Shing was born on February 1, 1955 in Hong Kong. He was an actor, known for The Crazy Companies (1988). He died on August 27, 2009 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Fui-On Shing

biography.bio: Ying Law is an actor and writer, known for Xiong xie (1981), Saan gai bin fung wong (1994) and File Noir (1989).
biography.name: Ying Law

biography.bio: Tat-Kwong Chan is known for his work on Le médaillon (2003), Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story (1993) and Crime story (1993).
biography.name: Tat-Kwong Chan
